item.title: Quiz – (Journey through templates, SFINAE and specialization) !!!
item.description: template<typename A, typename B> class TClass { public: TClass() { } // Overload #1 public: std::string SomeMethod(A a, B b) { std::ostringstream ostr; ostr << a << "-" << b; return ostr.
